Plot: Devon's decision has killed off a little part of me. I can't help but know that he has made the wrong choice. But bad decisions seems to be the theme at the moment. I am making them at every turn. For all the right reasons. Or so I keep telling myself. My new powers are being tested to the limits, with shocking consequences for me and my sire. How will we get out of this one? A Paranormal Reverse Harem Series. Fast Burn M/M/M/M/M/F *** Trials: The Forever Series, Book 6 - available now!
